statements: UPDATE consensus_voting_data SET voting_data = '{"option": "yes"}', consensus_mechanism_name = 'POA' WHERE consensus_mechanism_id = 1;
UPDATE consensus_voting_data SET consensus_mechanism_name = 'POS', voting_data = '{"option": "no"}' WHERE consensus_mechanism_id = 2;
UPDATE consensus_voting_data SET voting_data = '{"yes": 150, "no": 50, "abstain": 20}' WHERE consensus_mechanism_id = 1;
UPDATE consensus_voting_data SET consensus_mechanism_name = 'Proof of Stake' WHERE consensus_mechanism_id = 2;
UPDATE consensus_mechanisms SET mechanism_name = 'Proof of Work', description = 'Uses computational power to validate transactions' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE voting_data SET vote = 4.50, timestamp = '2022-02-14 18:30:00' WHERE voter_id = 101 AND mechanism_id = 2;
UPDATE consensus_mechanisms SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE voting_data SET vote = 8.75, timestamp = '2022-08-15 13:30:00' WHERE voter_id = 101 AND mechanism_id = 2
UPDATE consensus_mechanisms SET mechanism_name='Proof of Stake' WHERE mechanism_id=1;
UPDATE governance_records SET created_at='2022-11-15 10:30:00' WHERE record_id=3;
UPDATE consensus_mechanisms SET mechanism_name = 'DPoS', description = 'Delegated Proof of Stake consensus mechanism' WHERE mechanism_id = 1;
UPDATE governance_records SET record_type = 'Amendment', record_details = 'Updated by board resolution on 2022-09-30', created_at = NOW() WHERE record_id = 5;
UPDATE consensus_mechanisms SET description = 'Improved consensus mechanism for faster processing' WHERE mechanism_name = 'PBFT';
UPDATE voting_data SET choice = 'abstain', timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE voter_id = 101;
UPDATE consensus_mechanisms SET description = 'Improved consensus mechanism for faster decision-making' WHERE mechanism_name = 'PBFT';
UPDATE governance_records SET decision = 'approved' WHERE mechanism_id = 2 AND voter_id = 10;
UPDATE consensus_mechanisms SET description = 'Updated mechanism description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE voting_data SET vote_decision = TRUE, vote_timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE voter_id = 3;
UPDATE consensus_mechanisms SET launch_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE mechanism_name = 'Proof of Authority';
UPDATE voters SET voter_address = '123 Main Street, New York' WHERE voter_name = 'Alice';
